page.description: The .INSERT_PAGEBREAK() method inserts a page break code into the RTF object at the cursor location. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example inserts a page break into an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.set_cursor(10) obj.rtf.insert_pagebreak()
